summary: Domain Lifecycle & Quarantine features testing completed. All new backend APIs and frontend UI components are working correctly. Super Admin permissions are properly enforced.
passed_tests: GET /api/v3/quarantine-categories returns 200 with all expected categories
GET /api/v3/monitoring/coverage returns 200 with all required stats fields
POST /api/v3/asset-domains/{id}/quarantine - Super Admin can quarantine domain
POST /api/v3/asset-domains/{id}/remove-quarantine - Super Admin can remove quarantine
POST /api/v3/asset-domains/{id}/set-lifecycle - Super Admin can change lifecycle
Test data domaina.com is quarantined as expected
Test data expiring-7days-test.com has expired_released lifecycle
Frontend SEO Monitoring Coverage panel displays correct stats
Frontend view mode tabs (All, Unmonitored, Released, Quarantined) work correctly
Frontend Lifecycle column shows correct badges
Frontend shows quarantine warning icons on quarantined domains
Super Admin sees lifecycle/quarantine actions in dropdown
Regular Admin does NOT see lifecycle/quarantine actions in dropdown

features_verified.domain_lifecycle_status: Correctly implemented with active, expired_pending, expired_released, inactive, archived states
features_verified.quarantine_management: Super Admin can quarantine/unquarantine domains with categories
features_verified.monitoring_coverage_stats: Real-time stats showing domains in SEO, monitored, unmonitored, coverage %, released, quarantined counts
features_verified.view_mode_tabs: All 4 tabs (All, Unmonitored, Released, Quarantined) filter domains correctly
features_verified.permission_enforcement: Lifecycle and quarantine endpoints properly restricted to Super Admin only
features_verified.lifecycle_badges: Frontend correctly shows lifecycle status badges (Active, Released Not Renewed, etc.)
features_verified.quarantine_warning_icons: Orange shield icons displayed on quarantined domains

critical_code_review_comments: GOOD: DomainLifecycleStatus and QuarantineCategory enums properly defined in models_v3.py
GOOD: MONITORED_LIFECYCLE_STATUSES constant correctly identifies active and expired_pending as monitored
GOOD: Super Admin permission checks properly implemented on all lifecycle/quarantine endpoints
GOOD: SEO Monitoring Coverage endpoint calculates stats correctly including monitorable_domains denominator
GOOD: Frontend view mode tabs correctly use view_mode parameter for server-side filtering
GOOD: Quarantine warning badges (ShieldAlert icon) displayed on quarantined domains
GOOD: Released domains show 'Released (Not Renewed)' badge in Lifecycle column
GOOD: Regular Admin cannot access lifecycle/quarantine management features
seed_data_creation: Test data already existed: domaina.com, orphan-domain.com (quarantined), expiring-7days-test.com, tier2-site1-1.com (marked as released)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Domain Lifecycle & Quarantine features fully tested and working. Backend endpoints: GET /api/v3/monitoring/coverage, GET /api/v3/quarantine-categories, POST .../quarantine, POST .../remove-quarantine, POST .../mark-released, POST .../set-lifecycle. All lifecycle/quarantine mutations are Super Admin only. Frontend shows SEO Monitoring Coverage panel, view mode tabs (All, Unmonitored, Released, Quarantined), lifecycle status badges, and quarantine warning icons. Test credentials: superadmin@seonoc.com / SuperAdmin123! (super_admin), admin@seonoc.com / Admin123! (admin).
